};const handleQuantityChange=(id,newQuantity)=>{const updatedCartItems=cartItems.map(item=>{if(item.id===id){const quantity=Math.max(1,newQuantity);return{...item,quantity};}return item;});setCartItems(updatedCartItems);};const removeItem=id=>{const updatedCartItems=cartItems.filter(item=>item.id!==id);setCartItems(updatedCartItems);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"cart-header d-flex justify-content-center align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{onClick:handleButtonClick,className:"fa-solid fa-angle-right"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Cart"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidewar",children:[cartItems.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center",children:"Cart is Empty"}):cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"viewcart-img d-flex mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:"Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"view-inercantent",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"viewnumber-count",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleQuantityChange(item.id,item.quantity-1),children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:item.quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleQuantityChange(item.id,item.quantity+1),children:"+"})]})]})]},item.id)),cartItems.length!==0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"subtotal2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Subtotal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u20B9",cartItems.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.price*item.quantity,0).toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/mycart",children:"View Cart"})]})]})]});};
